fields.Title of Presentation: Moving Off Families and a Ramseyan Theorem
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: The 54th Spring Topology and Dynamical Systems Conference
fields.Conference Location: Virtual on Zoom. Hosted by Murray State University
fields.Description/Abstract: Gruenhage and Ma connected Baireness of function spaces with combinatorial properties of objects called moving off families. In this talk these combinatorial properties are are featured, and connected with among other things, a version of Ramsey’s theorem.
